refnamediv.refpurpose: Exit Csound as fast as possible, with no cleaning up.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: In Csound4 calls an exit function to leave Csound as fast as possible. On Csound5 exits back to the driving code.

refsect1.title: Initialisation
refsect1.para: Stops Csound on the initialisation cycle, returning the result ivalue, which defaults to zero. Note that it is usual for this opcode to be alone in an instrument.
